The ESPRIT study 9-month randomized , control clinical trial randomize 100 middle-aged adult parental history Alzheimer 's disease . Participants randomize simvastatin 40 mg one month 80 mg daily match placebo tablet . Fifty ESPRIT subject participate MRI sub-study .
